function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'foo'?
Is it impossible for function 'foo' to reach function 'main'?
Is it impossible for function '__builtin_abort' to reach function 'foo'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < N' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < N' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < N' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i < N' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < N' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < N' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'out (line 3)' used after its definition?
Is variable 'in (line 3)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'i (line 5)' remain in use at the end of function 'foo'?
Does variable 'step' remain in use at the end of function 'foo'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'if (out[i] != in[i])' be considered dead code?
Is this statement not dead: “in[i] = i * (i + 1);”?
